summary: Mike has over 20 years of technology, finance and business management experience, primarily focused on hyper-growth and scalable enterprises. Most recently Mike was a licensed Investment Banker for CKS Securities where he successfully closed two large venture rounds totaling 40MM for fast-growing technology companies in Arizona. Mike was previously the Senior Managing Director of YAM Capital, the private equity arm for Bob Parsons, Go Daddy's founder. Mike co-founded CopiaMobile (later nGage) where he served as its COO for three years and handled all aspects of company operations. Before venturing into small business entrepreneurship and banking Mike was one of the senior executives of GoDaddy.com, where he served as their Vice President of Technology and was the CTO of the technology business unit. He was responsible for the development of GoDaddy’s core Internet presence products, building the product engineering team and he spent the last two years at Go Daddy Mike running Global Operations for Go Daddy.  Mike spent 5 years at NCS Pearson as a Senior Software Engineer and eventually Chief Architect of their educational software devision. Mike cut his teeth at Motorola writing factory automation software.  Mike holds a B.S. in Computer Science, with minors in Math and Psychology, from the University of Arizona. He has 11 issued patents and plans on getting many more in the future.
